org.apache.giraph.comm

接口 WorkerClient<I extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,V extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,E extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,M extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>

  • 类型参数:
    I - Vertex id
    V - Vertex value
    E - Edge value
    M - Message data
    所有已知实现类:
    NettyWorkerClient

    public interface WorkerClient<I extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,V extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,E extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,M extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>
    Public interface for workers to establish connections and send aggregated requests.

    • 方法概要

      方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void authenticate()
      Authenticates, as client, with another BSP worker, as server.
      void closeConnections()
      Closes all connections.
      PartitionOwner getVertexPartitionOwner(I vertexId)
      Lookup PartitionOwner for a vertex.
      void openConnections()
      Make sure that all the connections to workers and master have been established.
      void sendWritableRequest(Integer destTaskId, WritableRequest request)
      Send a request to a remote server (should be already connected)
      void setup(boolean authenticate)
      Setup the client.
      void waitAllRequests()
      Wait until all the outstanding requests are completed.

    • 方法详细资料

      • setup

        void setup(boolean authenticate)
        Setup the client.
        参数:
        authenticate - whether to SASL authenticate with server or not: set by giraph.authenticate configuration option.

      • getVertexPartitionOwner

        PartitionOwner getVertexPartitionOwner(I vertexId)
        Lookup PartitionOwner for a vertex.
        参数:
        vertexId - id to look up.
        返回:
        PartitionOwner holding the vertex.

      • openConnections

        void openConnections()
        Make sure that all the connections to workers and master have been established.

      • sendWritableRequest

        void sendWritableRequest(Integer destTaskId,
                       WritableRequest request)
        Send a request to a remote server (should be already connected)
        参数:
        destTaskId - Destination worker id
        request - Request to send

      • waitAllRequests

        void waitAllRequests()
        Wait until all the outstanding requests are completed.

      • closeConnections

        void closeConnections()
                      throws IOException
        Closes all connections.
        抛出:
        IOException

      • authenticate

        void authenticate()
                  throws IOException
        Authenticates, as client, with another BSP worker, as server.
        抛出:
        IOException
